message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $8,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This product truly is valuable and I'm confident you'd benefit from it.
I appreciate your willingness to come down in price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,750?
